product_name: Levi's Commuter 511 Slim Fit Bike Trousers - Men's
long_description: Designed for urban cyclists, the men's Levi's Commuter 511 Slim Fit Bike Trousers give you stretch for the saddle and style for the post-ride pub stop. Stretchy twill fabric moves easily with you, whether you're riding or strolling through the city. Water-resistant and dirt-repellent Schoeller NanoSphere(R) protective finish helps fend off light rain, mud and road grit. Odor-resistant finish helps keep things fresh. U-lock holster is integrated with back waistband to make it easy to carry your lock as you ride. Double-layered seat and rear pockets protect shorts from saddle wear. Flipping up the cuffs exposes 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective tape, which helps boost your visibility. Levi's Commuter 511 Slim Fit Bike Trousers for men feature a higher back rise for added coverage while riding.
short_description: Designed for urban cyclists, the men's Levi's Commuter 511 Slim Fit Bike Trousers give you stretch for the saddle and style for the post-ride pub stop.
